definition: chain/cable (unit of length: 100 fathoms, about 185 m)/chain (unit of length: 66 feet, about 20 m)/to chain/to enchain

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
one's bicycle chain comes off/(fig.) to let sb down/to drop the ball/to screw up

sentences.english: The ends of each fibre rope were tied casually to a chain on the carrier rear-fence.
sentences.chinese: 每條纖維繩的末端均隨意地繫於車斗尾板一條鏈子上。

sentences.english: Detach a link from a chain.
sentences.chinese: 從鏈子上拆下一個鏈環。

sentences.english: You gauge the tiger's mood and put the leash on the tiger.
sentences.chinese: 你得考量一下老虎的情緒，然後用鏈子把它套住。

sentences.english: Hang Teets with his own chain.
The chain of my bicycle is off.
There may yet be a last-minute glitch.
sentences.chinese: 也可能在關鍵時刻掉鏈子。

sentences.english: Don't worry about the heavy load. it's chained down.
sentences.chinese: 別擔心裝載量大，已經用鏈子拴住了。

sentences.english: To bind their kings with chains, and their nobles with fetters of iron;
sentences.chinese: 要用鏈子捆他們的君王，用鐵鐐鎖他們的大臣。

sentences.english: And they made upon the breastplate chains at the ends， of wreathen work of pure gold.
sentences.chinese: 在胸牌上，用精金擰成如繩子的鏈子。

sentences.english: Keep out of the yard, though, the dogs are unchained;
sentences.chinese: 可是別到院子裏去，因爲狗沒有用鏈子鎖起來。

sentences.english: The simplified mechanics model of soft stratum deformation is built up.
sentences.chinese: 建立鏈子崖軟弱層變形的簡化力學模型。

sentences.english: But what's going on with the wallet chain?
sentences.chinese: 但是那條鏈子是怎麼回事兒？

sentences.english: The plain woman explained to me why she complained about the chain.
sentences.chinese: 長相平平的女人向我解釋她爲什麼抱怨那條鏈子。

sentences.english: And thou shalt make upon the breastplate chains at the ends of wreathen work of pure gold.
sentences.chinese: 要在胸牌上用精金擰成如繩的鏈子。

sentences.english: Thank you every time i need you to drop the chain.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你每次在我需要你的時候掉鏈子。

sentences.english: The chains that held my left leg were about two yards long.
sentences.chinese: 鎖在我左腿上的鏈子大約有兩碼長。

definition: weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]
(usu used in the negative) to be of importance or to matter/to be in the way/to be a hindrance
